header3: Your trusted partner for insurance, vehicle registration and translations

why_us.title: Our experience since 2006
why_us.text1:
Since 2006, 'Lider' has been operating as the first office in our region, offering a wide range of motor, property, life and agricultural insurance. 
 We provide comprehensive service and support in the selection of appropriate insurance policies. Photo of office or any with this type of professional services
why_us.realization: Vehicle registration in Poland and abroad
why_us.text2:
As the 'Lider' office, we provide agency services in the registration of vehicles imported from abroad and purchased in Poland. 
 Our team of professionals also deals with fees and formalities in offices.
why_us.text3:
At 'Lider' we value precision and reliability in translations. 
 We are passionate about foreign languages â€‹â€‹and we follow all linguistic changes. 
 We guarantee that every translation, regardless of the language and topic, will be accurate and professional
why_us.formalities2: We'll do all of them for your formalities and more
why_us.registration2: Check our registration price vehicle in its area

insurance.text1: All risks, i.e. insurance against all risks - AC insurance covers damage to the vehicle, its destruction or loss due to all events.
insurance.text2: The subject of insurance is the civil liability of any person who, while driving a motor vehicle during the duration of the insurance contract, caused damage in connection with the movement of that vehicle.
insurance.text3: 'Lider ' offers you the best offers on the market of known insurance companies. We guarantee the greatest professionalism and advice regarding vehicle insurance.

registration.text1: The 'LIDER' office offers mediation in the registration of vehicles both imported from abroad and purchased in Poland together with the necessary fees in all offices.
registration.text2: We register all types of vehicles, including passenger cars, trucks, specialized cars, agricultural tractors, mopeds, motorcycles, trailers, etc.
registration.text3: Comprehensive fees ( Customs Office, Tax Office, Department of Communication, document translations, recycling ) and complete re-registration of vehicles imported from abroad.
registration.we_provide: We provide full professionalism completing formalities

translations.text1: Years of experience have enabled us to provide you with the certainty of a perfect translation. By providing us with texts you receive their most faithful translation into any language you choose.
translations.text2: Excellent knowledge of foreign languages, careful tracking of all linguistic changes is our passion. We guarantee accurate and reliable translation, regardless of language and subject!
translations.best_price: The best prices on the market translations
translations.text3: We register all types of vehicles, including passenger cars, trucks, specialized cars, agricultural tractors, mopeds, motorcycles, trailers, etc.
translations.text4: Comprehensive fees ( Customs Office, Tax Office, Department of Communication, document translations, recycling ) and complete re-Translation of vehicles imported from abroad.
